short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool used to help with cycling servers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Server Cycling Tool extension provides users with a straightforward interface for generating and managing server cycle lists based on selected domains, environments, and custom server entries. It streamlines the server cycling process by allowing users to quickly generate, view, and copy cycle commands directly from their browser.
